contents.sentence: Did the Contractor clean, dry, and refill the core holes with either HMA of similar or smaller size particles or bridge deck repair material from the Qualified Products List (QPL) of Rapid Setting Patch Materials within one workday of coring operations? The rapid setting patch material shall be mixed in a separate container and placed in the hole in accordance with the manufacturer’s recommendations, consolidated by rodding, and struck-off flush with the adjacent pavement.
To fill the core holes rapidly.

a. Confirm that the Contractor cleaned, dried, and refilled the core holes with either HMA of similar or smaller size particles or bridge deck repair material from the QPL of Rapid Setting Patch Materials within one workday of coring operations.

b. If the rapid setting patch material was used, confirm that the rapid setting patch material was mixed in a separate container and placed in the hole in accordance with the manufacturer’s recommendations, consolidated by rodding, and struck-off flush with the adjacent pavement.
